en.alreadySubmittedError: Feedback already submitted for this order.

en.feedbackSubmittedMessage: Your feedback has been submitted successfully. We appreciate your time!
en.commentsPlaceholder: Tell us what you liked or how we can improve...
en.yourInfoSubtitle: Help us track your visits and improve your experience.
en.phoneHelper: We'll use this to track your visit history and provide better service.
en.emailHelper: Optional - helps us match your previous visits.

hi.alreadySubmittedError: Is order ke liye feedback pehle se submit ho chuka hai.
hi.genericError: Kuch galat ho gaya. Kripya dobara try karein.

hi.redirectMessage: Main page par redirect kiya ja raha hai...
hi.shareFeedbackSubtitle: Aapki rai hamare liye mahatvapurn hai!
hi.commentsPlaceholder: Batayiye aapko kya pasand aaya ya hum kya improve karein...
hi.yourInfoSubtitle: Aapki visits track karne aur experience improve karne mein madad milegi.
hi.phoneHelper: Isse hum aapki visit history track karke better service de sakte hain.
hi.emailHelper: Optional - aapki purani visits match karne mein madad karta hai.
